posts.post_content:
I'm looking and paying strong for the following back slogans. Looking for crease-free with decent centering (about vg to vg/ex). Back stamps OK. I'm open to slabbed or raw. Thanks.

Mais Paper Wrapper

Paper Crimped

Scientifically Blended
Stand the Test
Surpass Imagination
The Story in the Smoking
They Please
Unusual
Wonderfully Good
